## toyClassif A toy data of classification

#### Description
A toy data of classification drawn from a mixture Gaussian distribution. Only the three first variables
are discriminant.

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
data(toyClassif)
</code><pre>

#### Format
A list of two components:
* X: the design matrix of size n Ã— p drawn from a mixture Gaussian distribution ;
* Y: the class labels.
